response_requirements.extension_conditions: Unusual circumstances including need to search multiple facilities, voluminous records, or consultations
response_requirements.tolling_notes: Limited to one request for clarification or fee assessment issues

fee_structure.search_fee: Varies by requester category (commercial, media, educational, other)
fee_structure.copy_fee_notes: Duplication fees vary by agency and format
fee_structure.fee_waiver_criteria: Public interest requests; disclosure likely to contribute significantly to public understanding of government operations
fee_structure.fee_protection_notes: Search and duplication fees may be waived if agency fails to meet statutory time limits

exemptions.description: Information properly classified concerning national defense or foreign policy
Internal personnel rules and practices of an agency
Information specifically exempted from disclosure by statute
Trade secrets and confidential commercial or financial information
Inter-agency or intra-agency memorandums or letters (deliberative process privilege)
Personnel and medical files and similar files the disclosure of which would constitute a clearly unwarranted invasion of personal privacy
Records or information compiled for law enforcement purposes (with 6 specific subcategories)
exemptions.subcategories: Includes interference with proceedings, trial rights, privacy, confidential sources, investigation techniques, and endangerment

exemptions.description: Information contained in or related to examination, operating, or condition reports prepared by financial institution regulatory agencies
Geological and geophysical information and data, including maps, concerning wells

appeal_process.first_level: Administrative appeal to agency head or designated FOIA Appeals Officer
appeal_process.first_level_deadline_notes: No statutory deadline specified for filing administrative appeal
appeal_process.second_level_deadline_notes: No statutory deadline for filing court action

requester_requirements.request_format_notes: Any person may request records regardless of citizenship or location
requester_requirements.specific_format: Request must reasonably describe records sought

agency_obligations.electronic_submission_required: Agencies must maintain electronic FOIA request portals

validation_metadata.verification_notes: All fields verified from official federal statute text. Response times specified as business days (excluding Saturdays, Sundays, and legal holidays). Nine exemptions cataloged with specific citations. FOIA Improvement Act of 2016 included as last amendment.
